explains: n. 给予者，赠予人；送礼者

sentences.en: This is because making someone else happy makes the giver happy, too.
sentences.cn: 这是因为让别人快乐也会让给予者快乐。

sentences.en: It is better to be a giver than a taker.
Germany is the largest giver of aid among the wealthy countries of the West.
sentences.cn: 德国是西方富有国家中最大援助的给予国。
